options.label: C

multiple-choice.question: What is a current use of medical-grade super glue?

options.label: C
options.text: In surgery and as a household adhesive

options.label: D
options.text: In the production of precision gunsights

title: History vs. Cleopatra - Alex Gendler

multiple-choice.question: What was the relationship between Cleopatra and her brother?

options.label: B
options.text: They were siblings and co-rulers of Egypt.

multiple-choice.question: Why did Julius Caesar initially come to Egypt?

options.label: A
options.text: He was seeking refuge after being defeated in Rome's civil war.

options.label: B
options.text: He was demanding repayment of Egypt's debt to Rome.

options.label: C
options.text: He was trying to annex Egypt.

options.label: D
options.text: He was seeking to learn from Egypt's culture and knowledge.

multiple-choice.question: What was one of Cleopatra's notable achievements as a ruler?

options.label: A
options.text: She expanded Egypt's borders through military conquest.

options.label: B
options.text: She stabilized the economy and managed the bureaucracy.

options.label: C
options.text: She built many new infrastructure projects.

multiple-choice.question: Why did Octavian attack Antony and annex Egypt?

options.label: A
options.text: He was seeking to avenge Caesar's death.

options.label: B
options.text: He was trying to stop Cleopatra's meddling in Roman matters.

options.label: C
options.text: He was afraid of a woman in power.

options.label: D
options.text: He was seeking to expand Rome's borders.

multiple-choice.question: How did most of the information about Cleopatra survive?

options.label: A
options.text: Through her own writings and accounts.

options.label: B
options.text: Through the accounts of her friends and allies.

options.label: C
options.text: Through the accounts of her enemies in Rome.
